Namespace FxDialogue.Services.Endpoint

Classes

ConnectionClosed

Thrown by sender endpoint methods if connection became closed.

ServerNotAvailable

Thrown by IClientBinding.CreateConnection if server is not available.

Request
Response

Interfaces

IClientBinding
IConnection
IConnectionEvents

Connection events interface. Methods are called in context of connection handler thread, so should return immediately and processing of events must be asyncronous.

IReceieverEndpoint
ISenderEndpoint

Message sending interface, implemented by Services.
